values: 边缘；边界；边沿；边线；前沿；刀刃；刃口；利刃；锋利度；尖锐性；（微弱的）优势；微妙差别；（情绪的）紧张；（竞争的）激烈；尖刻的声调
使锋利；使尖锐；使徐徐移动；逐渐移动；慢慢前进；缓缓行进；略为增加（或减少）；（滑雪时）侧身滑行；给…加边；（在比赛中）取得微弱优势

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 急躁的；尖利的；刀口锐利的
使开刃；加边于；侧着移动（edge的过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指明显地标志一个表在或一广阔空间的边界，或终端线，也指极狭窄的空间。常用作比喻。
普通用词，指较窄的边沿。
指深容器的内边或河、湖等水域的最高线。
指物体的空白边，一般较宽。
侧重刚好在界线内的一部分表面上，指较宽的边缘，也可指边缘本身。
指地毯的须边、围巾的花边、烫发的卷边或人群的边缘。
指圆形或有曲线的物体的边缘。

word_group.brief_definition: 排挤；略胜一筹；（小心地）一步一步走出
竞争优势；竞争力；竞技优势
异常兴奋；极为激动；有浓厚兴趣
word_group.phrase: on the edge of your seat

word_group.brief_definition: 刀刃；前沿；使人领先的人物；深刻性；敏锐性
紧张不安的；烦躁的；易怒的
前缘；机翼翼面或螺旋桨叶片的前缘；前沿；前驱
印制板插头；边缘连接器；印刷板插头座
处于困境（或危难）的边缘
锋利的刃；紧要关头；敏锐；危急关头；事物发展的关键时期；刀口；刀刃

bilingual.source: The spider stayed at the edge of her web.
And that's you going over the edge!
You can't walk too close to the edge.
bilingual.target: 你不能走得太靠近边缘。

bilingual.source: Please don't go near the edge of the cliff!
You mustn't walk too close to the edge of the hill path.
bilingual.target: 你不能走得太靠近山路的边缘。

bilingual.source: The museum is situated on the edge of Lake Michigan in the USA.
bilingual.target: 博物馆位于美国密歇根湖的边缘。

bilingual.source: I can look over the edge and see the deck without being noticed.
bilingual.target: 我可以从边缘看过去，看到甲板而不被发现。

bilingual.source: I was really scared when I had to go over the edge of the cliff!
bilingual.target: 当我不得不越过悬崖边缘时，我真的很害怕！

bilingual.source: Bawang realized she must have placed the basket too near the water's edge.
bilingual.target: 巴旺意识到她一定是把篮子放得太靠近水边了。

list.abstract: EDGE（英 [edʒ]，美 [edʒ]），英语单词，作名词为边、边线、边界等。动词为徐徐移动、挤、加边于等。短语搭配为edge out（排挤；略胜一筹；）。例句有“Shimmering glass towers line the canal's edge.（闪烁的玻璃大厦沿运河矗立。）” EDGE的名词近义词有margin、superiority、advantage等。

EDGE是英文Enhanced Data Rate for GSM Evolution的缩写，即增强型数据速率GSM演进技术。EDGE是一种从GSM到3G的过渡技术，它主要是在GSM系统中采用了一种新的调制方法，即最先进的多时隙操作和8PSK调制技术。由于8PSK可将现有GSM网络采用的GMSK调制技术的符号携带信息空间从1扩展到3，从而使每个符号所包含的信息是原来的3倍。同名的还有格斗士Edge。

yingyinNormal.en: But when no one was looking, she'd go near the cliff, for the closer she came to the edge, the more she could hear, the more she could see, the more she could feel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但她却背着家人来到了悬崖边，她越走近悬崖边，听到的越多，看到的越多，感受到的越多。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's a woman who describes her vows as a suicide flirting with a bridge's edge. And a man who wears his wedding ring as a badge of shame, for the debutante deserved more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个女人将自己的婚誓比作在桥边犹豫自杀的徘徊，和一个将婚戒当作羞耻徽章的男人，因为他觉得配不上这位名媛。

yingyinNormal.en: He tricked me. He flew over there, and I went after him and slipped off the edge of the trail. I was hanging on by a tree branch. I was hanging by my fingertips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它使诈了，它又飞走了，然后我再追上去，但是我滑倒了，摔下了小路边，说时迟那时快，我抓住了一个树枝，我单靠着手指尖在那吊着。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this is what happens when people live on the edge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当人们活在危机边缘的时候，就是会发生这种事。

yingyinNormal.en: The force field. lt's a dome. We're at the edge of the arena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 电磁力场是个拱顶，我们在竞技场的边缘。

yingyinNormal.en: It's actually all to do with something that coats the edge of the leaf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上这和叶片边缘表层有关。

yingyinNormal.en: What you mean? We almost lost the arrow. It was on the edge of the building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么意思？我们差点失去那枝箭，它射在大楼边缘。

yingyinNormal.en: Finally she stood at the very edge. She saw a light. She leaned out to touch it and she slipped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 终于她站在了悬崖边缘, 她看到了亮光, 她伸出手去触摸, 可是滑了一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess I would say curious. I remember the first time I walked up on the edge of the Grand Canyon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想应该是好奇。我记得我第一次走在科罗拉多大峡谷边缘的情景。

yingyinNormal.en: Where? Near Barbosa Lake. He was standing on the edge of a ravine. What did Robert tell you when you got there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在哪？在巴博萨湖附近。他站在峡谷边上。你到之后罗伯特跟你说了什么？

yingyinNormal.en: You park on the edge of the Neutral Zone, you lock onto Harrison's position, you fire, you kill him and you haul ass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把飞船停在中立区边缘，然后锁定哈里森的位置，开火，杀了他就把飞船开回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's what matters. You're on the edge of a cliff. Today is the cliff. Tomorrow, there is nothing underneath your feet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来说的才是重要的，你正处在悬崖边缘，今天就相当于悬崖，明天你的脚下将空无一物。

yingyinNormal.en: How come every time we're on the edge of this reef, one of us is trying to leave? For once, can't we just enjoy the view?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为何每次我们到这珊瑚礁边缘，就有人想离开。我们就不能好好欣赏风景吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Let's start by identifying the parts of our flag. This edge is the hoist, and it's used to... Excuse me, sorry, excuse me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我们先开始认识旗帜的结构，这边是吊孔，用来……抱歉，借过一下。

yingyinNormal.en: No, what if it was a precursor movement along the leading edge of the plate boundary fault from Los Angeles all the way up to San Francisco?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，如果这是板块运动的开始，而板块的边界从洛杉矶一直延续到旧金山。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's why you're here, isn't it? To assist with our repairs? Why else would the head of Starfleet personally come to the edge of the Neutral Zone?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想这就是您来这里的原因，没错吧? 来帮助我们维修？不然为什么联盟的高官会亲自来到中立区的边缘地带?

yingyinNormal.en: Enclosed in a bubble made of the same material as the cell membrane, the golgi apparatus also gives the antibody directions, telling it how to get to the edge of the cell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 包在一个由细胞膜物质组成的泡泡里，高基式体也会给抗体指示，告诉它怎么去细胞的边缘。

yingyinNormal.en: And they say you've lost your edge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们说你锋芒不在了。

yingyinNormal.en: It gives it that extra edge. You've done us proud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别有一番风味，我们为你骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I looked at your blog. It's a little too cutesy for me. I need someone with edge. I have edge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，没错，但我查看了你的博客，对我来说有点太故意卖萌了，我需要一个犀利的人。我很犀利啊。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 边缘; 刃; 窄边; 加边于...
缓慢移动; 缓慢发展

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 边缘; 刃; 窄边; 加边于...

sense_info_list.en: a quality or factor that gives superiority over close rivals or competitors
move gradually, carefully, or furtively in a particular direction
sense_info_list.zh: 缓慢移动; 缓慢发展

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指非常明显的终端线，通常含有锋利的意思。
一般指曲线形或圆形的边。

word_family.mean: n. 边；边线；边界；边缘；刀口；刃；锋；优势；锋利；尖锐

sense_info_list.en: the outer or furthest point of something

examination_example.sentence: His team used a new measuring approach that involved finding any surviving remnants, of the casing to determine where the original <highlight>edge</highlight> was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的团队使用了一种新的测量方法: 通过查找套管中任何尚存的残余物，以确定原始边缘的位置。

sense_info_list.en: a quality or factor that gives superiority over close rivals or competitors

examination_example.sentence: There are some who say Marconi lost his <highlight>edge</highlight> when commercial broadcasting came along.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人说，当商业广播出现时，Marconi就失去了他的优势。

sense_info_list.en: provide with a border or edge

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 指较窄的边沿。
指地毯的须边、围巾的花边、烫发的卷边或人群的边缘。
指物体的空白边, 一般较宽。

examination_example.sentence: The floor-to-ceiling windows of his company's offices overlook Songdo Central Park, with a canal full of small boats and people fishing. Shimmering (闪烁的) glass towers line the canal's <highlight>edge</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他公司办公室的落地窗俯瞰松岛中央公园，运河里挤满了小船和钓鱼的人。闪闪发光的玻璃塔排列在运河边上。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: the outer or furthest point of something

examination_example.sentence: Cover the hole with the plastic sheet, securing the <highlight>edges</highlight> of the plastic with dirt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用塑料布盖住洞，用泥土固定塑料布的边缘。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指较窄的边沿。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the outer or furthest point of something

examination_example.sentence: He shouted back something and then he disappeared over the <highlight>edge</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他喊了几声，然后就消失在悬崖边上了。

examination_example.sentence: But still the soles' <highlight>edges</highlight> look fluffy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是鞋底的边缘看起来仍然很蓬松。

examination_example.sentence: I come from Kitengela, a farming community on the <highlight>edge</highlight>(边缘) of Nairobi National Park of Kenya(肯尼亚).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我来自肯尼亚内罗毕国家公园边缘的一个农业社区基滕格拉。
